name: Dungeon Talker
description:
Version with a few fixes: https://bruh-no.itch.io/sketch-dungeon-crawler-fixed

How to play:

Walk with WASD and turn around with q and e.

 Insult or compliment your enemies to either make them so happy or sad they'll leave. You can either say a single insult like "Idiot" or build small sentences. the structure should be for example "very nice nose" or "ugly nose". 

Some enemies are nicer, some meaner. They also have different insecurities, meaning some insults or compliments might be more effective.

Disclaimer: This project was created in a fairly short time and still has a lot of rough edges. Especially the web asset encoding looks really bad.

Music from #Uppbeat (free for Creators!): https://uppbeat.io/t/matt-stewart-evans/neighbourhood-oddities, License code: SQC71ELAYHQFDQQ7
